summary: Increases the force of Fus Ro Dah by varying amounts.
descriptionHtml:
This is a basic mod that alters the amount of force / blow away of Unrelenting Force 3 / \"Fus Ro Dah.\" Several .esps are included so you can pick the level of force of your choosing! A few options are in excess, but there are quite a few Unrelenting Force knockback mods with absurdly high values and I felt like compiling a wide array of settings into one download.

[B][U]TO INSTALL[/U]:[/B]
- Download the file and extract the desired .esp into \\Skyrim\\Data . If you think you will want to swap between settings, install more than one .esp.
-Only load one .esp when using the Skyrim launcher under Data Files as loading multiple settings for Unrelenting Force simultaneously may have unintended effects.

Available levels of force (Note that levels higher than 100,000% behave strangely):
+30% (as in 30% more powerful)
+50%
+100% (2x as much knockback)
+150%
+200% (3x)
+250%
+300% (4x)
+350%
+400% (5x)
+450%
+500% (6x)
+600% (7x)
+700% (8x)
+800% (9x)
+900% (10x)
+1,000% (11x)
+2,000% (21x)
+3,000% (31x)
+4,000% (41x)
+5,000% (51x)
+10,000% (101x)
+20,000% (201x)
+50,000% (501x)
+100,000% (1,001x)
+1,000,000% (10,001x)
+14,316,557,646% (Max accepted value)

Enjoy!
author: lethlora
